scripts.deploy_signs_upload: cd signs && gcloud functions deploy signs_upload --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy_signs_submit: cd signs && gcloud functions deploy signs_submit --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy_signs_approve: cd signs && gcloud functions deploy signs_approve --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy_signs_list: cd signs && gcloud functions deploy signs_list --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy_signs_admin: cd signs && gcloud functions deploy signs_admin --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy_signs_upload && npm run deploy_signs_submit && npm run deploy_signs_approve && npm run deploy_signs_list && npm run deploy_signs_admin
scripts.test_deploy: npm run test_deploy_signs_upload && npm run test_deploy_signs_submit && npm run test_deploy_signs_approve && npm run test_deploy_signs_list && npm run test_deploy_signs_admin
